descriptionHtml:
If you want disease immunity for all races go here:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81739/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81739/?[/url]

Just a simple mod I made initially for personal use then decided to share. It adds disease immunity ability to breton race... I always hated diseases and adding the ability from werewolf or vampire prevented my character from getting rested bonuses. So I made new ability in CK cloning argonian one and "adjusting" percentage :) 

Update 01. Sept. 2016 : 
------------------------------

I added modified version of mod that removes bear trap ability to infect player with disease regardless of your disease immunity. File is in optional section.
author: Jasmin Husic

files.name: Breton Disease Immunity - removed bear trap infections
files.fileName: Breton Disease Immunity - removed bear trap infections-78225-1-0.zip
